Address.label: Address
Address.value: TWO AMERICAN LANE, GREENWICH, Connecticut, 06831, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: GXO Logistics Inc is a contract logistics company. Its revenue is diversified across numerous verticals and customers, including many multinational corporations. It provides warehousing and distribution, order fulfillment, e-commerce, and reverse logistics, and other supply chain services differentiated by its ability to deliver technology-enabled, customized solutions at scale. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from the United Kingdom.
